noserverpermission.title: Error 403 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! It looks like you don't have proper permissions to run this command. **Make sure you have "Manage Server" permission.**

nochannelpermission.title: Error 403 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! It looks like you don't have proper permissions to run this command. **Make sure you have "Manage Channel" permission.**

nodevpermission.title: Error 403 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! It looks like you don't have proper permissions to run this command. **Only bremea development staff can use this command.**

nobotpermission.title: Error 403 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! It looks like I don't have proper permissions to run this command. **Make sure I have "Manage Channel" permission and my role is higher than your server's bot role.**

alreadyhaschannel.title: Error 403 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! It looks like you already have a counting channel running in this server - <#' + cg.channelid + '>. Currently, we limit servers to one couting channel at a time.

notacountingchannel.title: Error 400 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! It doesn't look like this is a counting channel. **Make sure the last message sent is a valid, positive integer.**

embed.title: You bought: {ITEM}
description: A {ITEM} was bought via the [CountBot Shop](https://bremea.com/countbot/shop)

curses.title: Curses {ACTION}
description: **Curses have been {ACTION} for this counting channel.** You can change this at any time by running `c;curses` again.

notacommand.title: CountBot Help
notacommand.description: Hmm... it seems that command doesn't exist. Check the spelling and try again.

help.countonly: :warning: **This command can only be used in counting channels.**
help.admin: :warning: **This command can only be members who have "Manage Channel" permissions.**
help.title: CountBot Help

mainmenu.title: CountBot Help
mainmenu.description: Use `c;h <command>` to learn more about a command | **[Need help? Click here.](https://discord.gg/meWdwaJ)**

fields.name: Setup Commands
value: `c;new <number>` Creates a new channel where the goal is to count to a number.
`c;merge` Sets up the bot in an extisting counting channel.

info.title: CountBot Information
info.description: CountBot is an easy to-use, highly configurable, and super fun minigame bot that manages a counting channel.

noitems.title: Error 404 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! It doesn't look like you have any items in your inventory. **You can buy items at the [CountBot Shop](https://bremea.com/countbot/shop).**

hasitems.title: Your Inventory
hasitems.description: You can buy more items with `c;shop`

statements.togithub: Click on a language to be taken to the GitHub Repository.
statements.set: To set this server's language, type the abbreviation.
statements.info: Type the language abbreviation for more information.

description: English is the primary language and fully supported. Some commands may appear in English even though your language is set to another.
Please select a new language for your server.
If you want to contribute with translations in your native language, join our [Support Server]({INVITE})
English is the primary language and fully supported. Some commands may appear in English even though your language is set to another.
Please provide a page number between **1** and **{TOTALPAGES}**.
Here you can manage the language of <@727569067895947383>!
**Please contact us if you'd like to help!**
The Magic8 developers have devoted many hours to being able to support other languages. Please consider taking the opportunity to help out!
- Language Contributor Role in our [Support Server](https://discord.gg/w9BqPr8)
- Advertisement on the Magic8 bot or in the #sponsors channel
**Please contact us if you'd like to help!**

notagoal.title: Error 400 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! Please enter a valid number for the goal. Example: `c;merge 500`

setup.title: Count to {GOAL}
description: **{USER} just setup CountBot in this channel!**
The goal is to count to {GOAL} Can you do it?

footer.text: Tip: Admins can make the challenge harder by changing the slowmode.

milestones.title: Milestones {ACTION}
description: **Milestones have been {ACTION} for this counting channel.** You can change this at any time by running `c;milestones` again.

invalidnumber.title: Error 400 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! Please enter a valid number. Example: `c;new 500`

created.title: Counting Channel Created
created.description: **Look, a brand new channel - {CHANNEL}!** The goal is to count to {GOAL}, can you make it?

newmessage.title: Count to {GOAL}
description: **{USER} just made a new counting channel!**
The goal is to count to {GOAL}. Can you do it?

footer.text: Tip: Admins can make the challenge harder by changing the slowmode.

powerups.title: Powerups {ACTION}
description: **Powerups have been {ACTION} for this counting channel.** You can change this at any time by running `c;powerups` again.

invalidnumber.title: Error 400 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! Please enter a valid number that's higher than the current goal. Example: `c;setgoal {EXAMPLEGOAL}`

extended.title: Goal extended
description: **The goal of this channel has been changed!** The new goal is to count to {USER}.

mainmenu.title: Click Here to go to the Shop 🛒
description: You can do `c;shop [query]` to search the shop for items and get links to buy them

noitemid.title: Error 400 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! Please enter an item id (run `c;inventory` to get a list of items in your inventory and their IDs). Example: `c;use p-s5`

notininventory.title: Error 404 <:flushed_think:735637678137016381>
description: Yikes! It doesn't look like you have any items in your inventory that have the ID `{ITEM}` (you can run `c;inventory` to get a list of items in your inventory and their IDs).
